help_messages.help:
Admin commands:
{prefix}shrug: Append shrug to the message
{prefix}emoji_size {size}: Set default emoji size
{prefix}emoji_list: Get a list of usable custom emojis
User commands:
{prefix}ping: Ping the selfbot (or as admin, any host)
{prefix}roll: Roll a dice, provide a number to select dice sides
{prefix}xkcd: Get an XKCD comic
{prefix}help: Get information on commands

Arguments: (optional) [required] {admin only, optional} {[admin only, required]}
Do {prefix}help (command) to see command help.
help_messages.emoji_list: {prefix}emoji_list: Get a list of usable custom emojis
